# Fire Dataset

# mycltu

# birthday
```{r}
birthday(23)
birthday(1:20)
```

# myboot2
```{r}
sam <- rnorm(20, mean = 10, sd = 4)
out_boot <- myboot2(iter = 2000, x = sam, fun = "mean", alpha = 0.05)
out_boot$ci
```

# mybin
```{r}
mybin(iter = 500, n = 10, p = 0.5)
```
